## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G18190](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G18190)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>CCT4</u>
- **Gene Name:** Chaperonin containing T-complex polypeptide-1 subunit 4
- **Description:**   TCP-1/cpn60 chaperonin family protein;(source:Araport11)

- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
